<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/provider/payment/initiation/webhook/{pactualId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Endpoint to send a Payment Initiation Webhook from BaaS.

>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>
